story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_0100_10: We’re not done yet! Bring it on!
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_0300_10: Both you and Dragonite are completely worn out!
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_0400_10: Let me tell you something about Red.
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_0600_10:
He apparently put himself through some harsh
training atop Mt. Silver.
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I still remember how frustrating it was to lose
to Red and Blue back in Kanto.
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Both Dragonite and I need to approach this like
challengers, not Champions...
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_0900_10: and go through A LOT more!
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_1400_10: I can’t believe he actually withstood that...
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_1500_10: Well done, Lance! I think you’ve had enough.
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Then, Alder! Please step in and push us even
harder!
story_arceus_01_04000/2401_1001_2200_10:
Here I come—Lance! Dragonite! Surpass
your limits!
